description: Tool quality definitions and salvageable components for the Lockpicking system

toolQualities.name: Bare Hands
toolQualities.description: Attempting to manipulate the lock with fingers only.
toolQualities.flavorText: Your fingers probe the mechanism, but without proper tools, your touch is clumsy.

toolQualities.name: Improvised Tools
toolQualities.description: Improvised tools such as bent wire, hairpins, or scrap metal.
toolQualities.flavorText: Makeshift picks fashioned from whatever's at hand. Serviceable, but fragile.

toolQualities.name: Tinker's Toolkit
toolQualities.description: Proper lockpicking tools from a Tinker's Toolkit.
toolQualities.flavorText: Professional tools passed down through generations of Scrap-Tinkers.

toolQualities.name: Masterwork Tools
toolQualities.description: Masterwork tools of exceptional quality, often Dvergr-crafted.
toolQualities.flavorText: Tools of legend - each pick precisely weighted, each edge perfectly honed.

salvageableComponents.name: Wire Bundle
salvageableComponents.description: A bundle of salvaged wires, useful for improvised tools and repairs.

salvageableComponents.name: Small Spring
salvageableComponents.description: A basic mechanical spring, a fundamental component for many devices.

salvageableComponents.name: High-Tension Spring
salvageableComponents.description: A quality mechanical spring under high tension. Valuable for crafting.

salvageableComponents.name: Pin Set
salvageableComponents.description: A set of precision pins from a lock mechanism. Useful for crafting lockpicks.

salvageableComponents.name: Circuit Fragment
salvageableComponents.description: A fragment of Old World circuitry. Highly valued by Scrap-Tinkers.

salvageableComponents.name: Power Cell Fragment
salvageableComponents.description: A partially depleted power cell. Can be recharged or used for parts.

salvageableComponents.name: Encryption Chip
salvageableComponents.description: A rare Old World encryption chip. Its secrets are incomprehensible to most.

salvageableComponents.name: Biometric Sensor
salvageableComponents.description: An advanced security component from the World Before. Exceedingly rare.
